title: Present in Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has logged into an account with an MLBN entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream can be present in the Hero

title: Playback from Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an account with the MLBN entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the "Watch Live" option on the home page's hero for the MLBN live stream
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback 

AND

+ The MLBN stream will begin playing at the live point

title: Live Indicator Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live stream is available in the hero
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the MLBN hero image
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A "LIVE" indicator will not be present in the hero

title: Duration Not Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream is present in the hero on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the hero
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The duration of the MLBN live stream will NOT be present

title: Present in Today
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has logged into an account with an MLBN entitlement

AND

+ The user's favorited team is playing live
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream can be present in the "Today on MLB.TV" carousel if the game is in the hero

title: Playback from Today on MLB.TV
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an account with the MLBN entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the MLBN option on the home page's "Today on MLB.TV" carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback 

AND

+ The MLBN stream will begin playing at the live point

title: Live Indicator Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live stream is available in the Today carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the carousel MLBN tile
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A "LIVE" indicator will be present on the thumbnail

title: Duration Not Present
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The MLBN Live Stream is present in the Today on MLB.TV carousel on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the MLBN tile in the carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The duration of the MLBN live stream will NOT be present

title: Live Indicator at Live Point
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched an MLBN live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the scrubber
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Video player will begin at the live point

AND

+ A Live indicator will be displayed

title: Closed Captioning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has launched an MLBN live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Selecting the CC quick-action button
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The closed captioning feature will be enabled

AND

+ CC will be present on the video player

AND 

+ The user can toggle the CC feature off

THEN

+ CC will no longer be present on the video player

title: Player Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched an MLBN live stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Utilizing the player controls
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to play and pause playback

AND

+ If paused, tap the grey live button to jump to live point (Red indicator at live point)

title: MLBN without Entitlements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an account without the MLBN or MLBTV/MLBN Adobe Pass entitlement

EX: Unauthorized, Free, Anonymous, and AtBat users.
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the MLBN live stream tile in the "Today on MLB.tv" carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The tile will have a lock icon

AND

+ The user is unable to launch the MLBN content

title: Title and Text Field (VSM Content)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing the MLB Network content in the Hero section
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the copy displayed
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The fields will display the following copy, 

"MLBN Presents MLB Tonight"
"Join your favorite hosts Harold Reynolds and Fee Chin to recap the best plays of the night!"

title: Background Image (VSM Content)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is viewing the MLB Network content in the hero or the "Today on MLB.tv" tile
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the background image of the hero or tile
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The background image will be from VSM content

AND

+ The background image should NOT be the MLB Network logo

AND

+ The backbround image SHOULD be the studio image

title: MLBN Only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user logs into an account with just MLB Network entitlements

AND

+ The account is not entitled to MLB.tv or other non-game content (SLive, SVOD)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches MLBN content from the Hero or the Today on MLB.TV carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback

AND

+ The MLBN live stream will play at the live point

title: MLBN IAP Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

+ The user has navigated to the MLB.tv paywall
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Selecting the MLB Network OR MLB Network/At Bat bundle in the paywall SKU options

AND

+ Successfully navigating through the IAP flow
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to launch MLB Network live content from the Hero or "Today" carousel in Watch Now

title: MLBN unentitled user from MLB Network Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user that is not entitled to MLBN
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the MLBN content from the MLB Network tab
custom_expected: THEN the paywall will be displayed

title: MLB Network Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user navigates to the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on the MLB Network segment
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network tab will display

AND

+ Watch Live Now video player will be featured

AND

+ The "Coming Up" schedule will be available

title: Current Show Description
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB Network page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Watch Live Now program header and description
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The title of the show is displayed

AND

+ The description of the show is displayed underneath the title

AND

+ The time of airing is displayed underneath the description

title: Program List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB Network segment under Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Viewing the "Coming Up" schedule
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Start times and Program titles will be displayed in a menu the user can scroll through

title: Authorization - User Logs in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is not logged in with an MLB account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user has been taken to the login screen
after tapping the MLB Network Play button
and logs in with a valid account
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be taken the MLB Network MVPD auth flow in a webview

title: Authorization - User Creates Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is not logged in with an MLB account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user has been taken to the login screen
after tapping the MLB Network Play button
and creates a new account
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The user will be taken the MLB Network MVPD auth flow in a webview

title: Unsuccessful Authorization
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is on the MLB Network auth flow webview
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user inputs invalid cable credentials
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be presented with an error message
and video playback will not commence

title: MLB Network - Logged-in, MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in, MVPD authorized user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

title: MLB Network - Free, MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in, MVPD authorized user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

title: MLB Network - Logged-out, No entitlement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-out user, without MVPD authorization or MLBN entitlement user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should be directed to the login screen

title: MLB Network - Exec Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has signed into an executive account

AND

+ The executive account is entitled for all contentTypes
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the MLBN live stream in the Home page 

AND

+ Selecting the MLBN live stream from the Hero or Today's carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Exec user will receive successful playback

AND

+ The MLBN live stream will play back from the live point

title: MLB Network - Logged-in, MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in, MLBN entitled user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab

AND 

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the MLBN content on the Watch Now Tab

AND 

+ The user taps on the MLBN content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

+ The MLB Network stream will begin playback

title: MLB Network - Logged-in, No entitlement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A logged-in user, without MVPD authorization or MLBN entitlement user navigates to the MLB Network segment in the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Tapping the play button on the "Watch Live Now" MLBN video
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should be directed to the paywall
